name: Cyber Runner (cvives652)
description:
Cyber Runner is and infinite runner game for the November GameGen Studio Jam. The goal is to collect Ramen bowls and avoid obstacles to reach the highest score! Be aware of rival bikers and avoid them at all cost! 

For better game experience, it is recommended to download the game.

*************************

Controls:

A - Move to the left

D - Move to the right

Left Shift - Drift to the direction

Escape - Toggle pause

*************************

Team members:

- SnowNeko

- David Tucker

- Gerardo Tioseco

- Christian Vives
